required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiological Characteristics of the Population of Persons With Gender Dysphoria : Data From the Cohort Follow-up in CHRU de Nancy

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective study in a single academic regional transgender referral center. data from the cohort follow-up in CHRU de Nancy

primary_outcome.description: Number of new cases of arterial hypertension, stroke, myocardial infarction during the specified period (2004-2020) /Time each person was observed, totaled for all persons
Number of new cases of dyslipidemia during the specified period (2004-2020) /Time each person was observed, totaled for all persons

secondary_outcome.description: Number of new cases of malignancies during the specified period (2004-2020) /Time each person was observed, totaled for all persons
Number of new cases of psychiatric diseases malignancies during the specified period (2004-2020) /Time each person was observed, totaled for all persons
Mortality during the specified period (2004-2020) /Time each person was observed, totaled for all persons

intervention.description: Retrospective analysis of existing data collected as a part of the regular follow-up
intervention.other_name: Retrospective analysis of existing data collected as a part of the regular follow-up

study_pop.textblock: Subjects who met diagnostic criteria for gender dysphoria (International Classification of Diseases 11th Revision. https://icdwhoint. 2018) and were seen regularly in the outpatient clinic at our department of endocrinology

criteria.textblock: Retrospective analysis of available data as a part of the regular care of subjects with gender dysphoria. All measurements were made at the time of the routine follow-up visits

eligibility.gender_description: Subjects who met diagnostic criteria for gender dysphoria (International Classification of Diseases 11th Revision. https://icdwhoint. 2018) and were seen regularly in the outpatient clinic at our department of endocrinology
